topic_description: Some reviewers mentioned that the sunscreen leaves a white cast on their skin, especially if they have darker skin tones.
A few reviewers complained that the sunscreen feels greasy and heavy on the skin.
Many reviewers with sensitive skin said that this sunscreen did not irritate their skin.
Reviewers generally agreed that the sunscreen provides good SPF protection.
The sunscreen is considered to be affordable by many reviewers.
